billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Extends for two years the authorization of additional sales and compensating use taxes for the county of Albany
summary: Extends for two years the authorization of additional sales and use tax for the county of Albany from November 30, 2009 until November 30, 2011.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Albany
